import * as React from 'react'; import { Box, Button, InputLabel, Paper, Select } from "@mui/material" import axios from "axios" import { useState } from "react" import style from './UploadArquivo.module.scss' export const UploadArquivo = () => { const [retorno, setRetorno] = React.useState() React.useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:3001/GRT/Utilizaveis") .then(res => setRetorno(res)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) const [teste, setTeste] = useState() console.log(teste) return ( <>
GRT

Nenhum arquivo selecionado

{teste ? teste : '' }
) }
